input_text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to make crab curry?
input_text.Response A: Sure! To make crab curry, you will need crab, curry paste, coconut milk, fish sauce, and lime. You can also add other ingredients like beans, vegetables, or meat. Simply mix the ingredients together and cook until the curry is hot and bubbling. Serve with rice or noodles. Enjoy!
input_text.Response B:
OH YEAH! CRAbby CURry! 🦀🍛

FIRST, GET Crab MEAT. 🐚

SECOND, GET Spices. 🌿

THIRD, GET Coconut MILK. 🥛

FOURTH, GET Veggies. 🥔

FIFTH, COOK IT! 🍳

YUM! CRAbby CURry! 😋

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.

label_annotations.factors_b: Formatting of Response B is unusual and whilst it ultimately meets the high level brief the capitalisation of words and use of emojis feels too relaxed
